So I built ServaLabs to fix that.
We made Atom—a single, powerful server that:

Replaces office PCs, NAS, firewalls, CCTV NVRs, and 20+ cloud services.
Cuts costs by 60% and boosts productivity by 30%.
Has AI baked in—automate tasks, deploy AI agents, and optimize workflows.
No more juggling a hundred IT systems. Just one machine that does it all.
